Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.user

At a high level the User SDK supports the following functionality: User registration and login with username & password User registration and login with Facebook Management of user attributes

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IUserManager
    Methods in this interface provide convenient job creation methods that provide easy access to the underlying IUserService functionality.
    IUserService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the Paloma Mobile Platform User Service RESTful API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventLocalUserUpdated
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) whenever the localUser is created or updated (e.g.
    JobLoginUser
    Convenience wrapper around IUserService.validateCredentials(String, IUserCredential) used to clear local caches and then attempt to login an existing user user.
    JobRegisterUser
    Convenience wrapper around IUserService.registerUser(String, IUserCredential) used to clear local caches and then attempt to register a new user user.
    TestUtilities
    User creation utilities designed for use in Instrumentation tests.
    User
    Class User represents the information available about the currently registered local user.
    To register a user call IUserManager#requestRegisterUser(IUserCredential).

Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.user Description

At a high level the User SDK supports the following functionality:
  • User registration and login with username & password
  • User registration and login with Facebook
  • Management of user attributes
